        Returns:
        whether the job is enabled

      • getConcurrency

        int getConcurrency()
        Returns:
        how many jobs can run at the same time, zero for no limits

      • isLeaderOnly

        boolean isLeaderOnly()
        Returns:
        whether the job should be only executed on leader servers

      • isFollowerOnly

        boolean isFollowerOnly()
        Returns:
        whether the job should be only executed on follower servers

      • getCron

        @Nullable
java.lang.String getCron()
        Returns:
        the CRON expression

      • getFixedDelay

        @Nullable
java.time.Duration getFixedDelay()
        Returns:
        the Duration between the time of the last execution and the beginning of the next. For example 10m == 10 minutes

      • getInitialDelay

        @Nullable
java.time.Duration getInitialDelay()
        Returns:
        the Duration before starting executions. For example 10m == 10 minutes

      • getFixedRate

        @Nullable
java.time.Duration getFixedRate()
        Returns:
        the Duration between executions. For example 10m == 10 minutes

      • getScheduler

        @NotBlank
@NotBlank java.lang.String getScheduler()
        Returns:
        the name of a javax.inject.Named bean that is a ScheduledExecutorService to use to schedule the task

@NotNull JobConfiguration.ConsumerQueueConfiguration getConsumer()

      • mergeWith

        JobConfiguration mergeWith(JobConfiguration overrides)
        Parameters:
        overrides - the configuration which non-default values will override the values in this configuration
        Returns:
